data.text: @zeynep @Craig_A_Spencer After working from home for a year due to COVID (now hybrid), I think coming into the office with cold/flu symptoms is something we should insist on *never* going back to (and that was common even in the jobs that *have* sick leave).

@zeynep @nataliexdean @Craig_A_Spencer These are wonderful ideas. All we need are politicians willing to endorse them. The more enlightened of the two parties wouldn't even endorse school improvements during a pandemic:
